version_description: Minor bug fix

- New Stories: On Ice, Special Delivery, Pearl
- Engine stability fixes & improvements

- Adds support for downloading stories in the background.
- Many fixes and performance improvements.

Known issues:
- 'HELP' has been updated with bug fixes and must be downloaded again.

The Simpsons "Planet of the Couches" VR Experience Coming Soon!

- Adds support for downloading stories in the background.
- Many fixes and performance improvements.

Known issues:
- 'HELP' has been updated with bug fixes and must be downloaded again.
Fixed device capabilities requirements for the application.

* Premiere of our latest story: "Rain or Shine" by Felix Massie
 * Performance enhancements and bug fixes
Added a new category for partner content, bug fixes and optimizations.

Bug fixes and optimizations.
Fixed Cardboard issue for iPhone 7s devices.
We are always working to improve your experience with Spotlight Stories with new stories, new features, and bug fixes.
We are always working to improve your experience with Spotlight Stories with new stories, new features, and bug fixes.
We are always working to improve your experience with Spotlight Stories with new stories, new features, and bug fixes.

• Son of Jaguar, directed by Jorge Gutierrez. In the most important match of his life, the once mighty masked luchador, Son of Jaguar, faces his legacy, his family, and what it means to be a part of something bigger than himself.
• Sonaria. Follow two ever-changing creatures as they flow from one life-form to another on a vivid journey of sound and light.
• Just a tip - wear headphones for best experience!
• We are always working to improve your experience with new stories, new features, and bug fixes.

Age of Sail, directed by ACADEMY AWARD-winning filmmaker John Kahrs and featuring the voice of Ian McShane. Produced with Chromosphere and Evil Eye Pictures.
Headphones make it better!

Enhanced user interface and bug fixes.

- Google Doodles and Google Spotlight Stories teams have collaborated to create the first-ever Virtual Reality (VR) / 360° interactive video Doodle to celebrate the life and artistry of French illusionist and film director Georges Méliès.

- We are always working to improve your experience with new stories, new features, and bug fixes.

- Always better with headphones!
We are always working to improve your experience with new stories, new features, and bug fixes.

- Meet the cast of Wes Anderson’s Isle of Dogs. Together with Fox Searchlight, Fox Next, Felix & Paul Studios, Indian Paintbrush and Google Spotlight Stories, Isle of Dogs Behind the Scenes (in Virtual Reality) puts you in the middle of the film’s set, face to face with the cast of dogs as they’re interviewed. Works with Cardboard. Better with headphones!

- We are always working to improve your experience with new stories, new features, and bug fixes.

- Support for more devices with fewer sensors
- Added features to playback engine: supporting optimized projection video formats, supporting instantiated geometry, improved audio compression
- Bug fixes include: fixing intermittent crash bug, memory leak, and animation looping bug.
- Enhancing user interface
